Course.title: Computer Engineering for Software Engineers
Course.description: Expand your knowledge in computer engineering as a software engineer with this comprehensive course.

Sections.title: Digital Logic Design
Sections.description: Learn the fundamentals of digital circuits, Boolean algebra, and logic gates.

Sections.title: Computer Architecture
Sections.description: Explore processor design, memory hierarchy, and parallelism in computer systems.

Sections.title: Embedded Systems
Sections.description: Understand the basics of embedded systems, microcontrollers, and real-time operating systems.

Sections.title: Networking Fundamentals
Sections.description: Gain insights into network protocols, topologies, and the OSI model.

Sections.title: Operating Systems Concepts
Sections.description: Delve into process management, memory management, and file systems.

Sections.title: Hardware-Software Integration
Sections.description: Learn about the interaction between hardware and software, and techniques for optimizing performance.
